name: Courant Catch:3 charging station
description: I have visions of this beautiful charging station and catchall in my home. It effortlessly charges devices while keeping accessories and other bits and bobs safely organized. It would look grand and be convenient in an entryway, on a nightstand or on a kitchen countertop. It comes in five colors in leather and four colors in linen. It's pricier than your everyday charger, but it's so aesthetically pleasing and elegant that it's worth it.

name: iS Clinical Super Serum Advance
description: I am absolutely

name: NuFace Trinity starter kit
description: I will never stop raving about the

name: Ember smart mug
description: Perfect for new moms or the easily distracted, this temperature-controlled mug keeps coffee and other hot drinks at exactly the right temperature for as long as you need. It has a long battery life and can be temperature controlled via an app that can even send you notifications. It's available in three different colors.

name: AeroGarden Elite
description: The

name: Hat Attack Shore visor
description: What is it about moms and their visors? They just love them. Upgrade hers to this chic little number from Hat Attack. It has a packable design with an elastic band that makes it extra convenient for her summer travels, and features fun frayed edges on a broad brim that protects her skin from UV rays. It's a sophisticated take on your everyday visor.

name: Design Within Reach Riflessi Vase
description: Bring a dash of elegance to your mom's space with this drop-dead gorgeous vase. Available in clear or bronze, this stunning item is made from borosilicate glass that's been mouth-blown by Venetian artisans. It just doesn't get more luxurious than that! The unique design will add a ton of visual interest and pop of whimsy without feeling too eccentric.

name: TheraBody TheraFace Pro
description: Therabody's TheraFace device uses the power of percussive therapy and much more to create an eight-in-one powerhouse beauty gadget. Gentle percussive massage relaxes the face, helping reduce jaw muscle discomfort. LED light therapy helps to minimize the look of fine lines, wrinkles and acne. A cold therapy ring decreases inflammation, while a hot ring claims to help ease pain and a cleansing ring gets a deeper clean for the freshest possible skin. Use it in any number of different combinations to target skin issues or facial discomfort with ease.

name: Paravel weekender bag
description: I regret to inform you that this chic bag is as functional as it is stylish, and worth every single penny of it’s $295-and-up price tag. The construction of the bag is as good as it gets. It feels very sturdy and durable, which is a must when you’re making a significant financial investment and also when it will inevitably get quite knocked about during travel. The bag has convenient interior pockets, a removable and adjustable shoulder strap and strong top handles, but my favorite functional feature is the straps that slide over the trolley of your luggage. The bag comes in two colors, tan and black. I went with black, but it was a tough call seeing as both options are so refined and sophisticated. You can also add an embroidered or painted monogram or emoji in various colors and styles to customize it further.

name: The Citizenry stonewashed linen bed bundle
description: I've slept on a lot of linen sheets in my day, but there's no comparison to this lavish set. It includes one sheet set (a flat sheet, fitted sheet and two pillowcases), one duvet cover and two extra pillowcases. Help mum set an elegant, comfortable and cozy tone in her bedroom — she'll never want to get out of bed. The set is available in 12 different solid colors and four different patterns in sizes full, queen, king and Cal king.

name: Dyson V11 Animal cordless stick vacuum
description: There's a good chance mom is still devoted to her 200-year-old vacuum, but once she gets her hands on this cordless wonder she's never turning back. Everything about the

name: Prada flower-print silk scarf
description: Few things are as timeless and elegant as a silk scarf, and this lovely floral option from Prada is sure to make your mother's day. It features the brand's signature triangle logo in the corner, can be styled in myriad ways and is sure to become a staple in her summer wardrobe.

name: Tata Harper clarifying mask
description: Tata Harper's cult-fave clarifying mask is a dream for acne-prone or congested skin. It deep cleans, exfoliates and soothes redness thanks to a powerful AHA and BHA blend that act as a chemical exfoliant to help clear blemishes, buildup and more. African wild grape and raw honey hydrate and soothe while quartz sand microcrystals exfoliate to smooth and soften the skin.

name: Dusen Dusen stripe cotton bathrobe
description: Available in sizes S to 3X, this cheerful striped bathrobe is a perfect addition to your mom's cozy self-care routine. It's made with cotton-terry fabric and features a tie closure. This popular bathrobe is perfect for a mom who loves bold fashion (and

name: Our Place cookware set
description: Give your mom's hardworking cookware a major facelift with these sweetly colorful sets from Our Place. This multifunctional four-piece set features full and mini sizes of the brand's bestselling Always Pan 2.0 and the Perfect Pot. They're made with a nontoxic nonstick ceramic coating that is as strong as it is functional. The set is available in six colorways.

name: Mejuri pavé diamond small hoops
description: You can't go wrong with jewelry, and these sophisticated diamond hoops are a sure bet. They're made of 14-karat solid gold with 32 single-cut diamonds each. Stunning! You can also get them in white gold if that's more her vibe.

name: Tory Burch Lee Radziwill petite bag
description: A Birkin bag might be a bit over the top for Mother's Day, but Tory Burch's gorgeous Lee Radziwill bag is just as timeless. This structured, elegant mini bag is made with soft, smooth leather and features a logo key charm and push-lock clasp. It also comes with an adjustable strap that you can keep on or remove. It's perfect for a fashion-loving mama.

name: Lunya washable silk tee pants set
description: Elevate your mom's pajama game with this silky soft, polished loungey pajama set. it features a full-coverage, oversized top with flowy, elbow-length sleeves and a high-low hem and breezy pants with side slits. It's made with washable mulberry silk and is available in sizes XS to 2X in four different colors.

name: Kindle Paperwhite e-reader
description: If your mom is a bookworm, then she needs a Kindle Paperwhite. It's a thin, lightweight e-reader with a glare-free display that looks like real paper, not a screen — so she can read without straining her eyes, indoors and outdoors. This latest version of the Kindle is waterproof and has a long-lasting battery and 8GB of storage for all of her books, magazines and audiobooks.

name: Ruggable’s Damali washable rug
description: There’s nothing like a stylish floor covering to breath new life into a space, and this artisan-inspired option from Ruggable promises to do just that. With a neutral color scheme and a kinetic print, this traditionally-styled rug will bring a burst of flair to any room. It’s available in

name: Dyson Special Edition Airwrap multistyler
description: The Dyson Airwrap is the kind of gift that both hair care devotees and styling novices love. It makes drying and styling just about every hair type an absolute pleasure and is an investment that is worth every penny. A couple of years ago, my siblings and I gifted our very low-maintenance mother with her own and she actually shed a few tears of joy. It's worth the shocked reaction alone!

name: J.Crew lightweight cashmere wrap
description: A new cashmere wrap is always a good idea, and this lightweight option is ideal for breezy spring and summer nights. It's available in three colors and has a sweet fringe detail. It's the perfect layering piece for the months ahead.

name: Yves Saint Laurent Black Opium eau de parfum
description: This classic YSL fragrance is as warm, cozy and comforting as it gets. It has notes of black coffee, white flowers and vanilla that feel refined and intoxicating, never too cloying. It's a modern take on a vanilla scent that stays timeless as ever. It's my personal go-to on rainy days.

name: Cire Trudon Joséphine scented candle
description: If your mom is more a candle lover than a perfume fiend, then you can't go wrong with any of Cire Trudon's delectable scents, though I am partial to "Joséphine." It has notes of Turkis rose, Egyptian jasmine and Chinese camelia with a warm, woody base of white musk and sandalwood. The hand-blown vessel features the brand's signature gold leaf, making it just as aesthetically pleasing as it is yummy.

name: Assouline "Bali Mystique" book
description: This coffee book makes a big splash, with a bold cover that echoes the vibrant portrait of Bali within. It's a linen-wrapped hardcover book with photographs of Bali's bamboo architecture, rice terraces and traditions and smiles. It will be the perfect addition to mom's coffee table.

name: Apple Watch Series 8 smartwatch
description: With amazing health features like notifications about irregular heart rhythms, sleep tracking, blood oxygen monitoring and fall detection, this watch can just about do it all. It's stylish and functional — and even the most tech-averse mom will love having one on her wrist.

name: Aesop Resurrection Aromatique hand wash and hand balm duet
description: Everyone wants a fancy hand soap and lotion duo in their bathroom, but it's definitely a splurge. That's why it's a great gift for everyone, whether you've got a housewarming coming up or it's time to get your mother a little something to show her you care. Aesop's Resurrection duet is a delightfully scented pair of skin care items that never go out of style.

name: An aromatic hand soap from Aesop
description: Packed to the brim with nourishing oils and the uplifting aromatic fragrance of rosemary leaf, mandarin rind and cedar, Aesop's adored Resurrection hand wash belongs on any home's kitchen or bathroom sink.

name: A countertop frozen fruit soft-serve maker
description: This countertop soft-serve maker transforms frozen fruit into creamy sorbet confections in just 10 minutes or less. All of the components are also dishwasher safe so clean up is less of a hassle.

name: A linen-covered wireless gadget charger
description: Ideal for anyone who loves aesthetically pleasing functionality or runs at the site of cord clutter, this Belgian linen-covered charging pad can keep all their gadgets charged in one place, including watches, tablets and phones.

name: A large linen journal from Shinola
description: This large hard-cover journal from Shinola is American-made using sustainably sourced acid-free, ruled paper and smyth-sewn binding for extra durability. The linen cover comes in six colors with monogramming available.

name: A bag of fair trade artisan coffee beans
description: Roasted by Denver, Colorado-based Huckleberry Coffee Roasters, this bag of coffee beans exclusive to Trade Coffee is sweet, smooth and boasts notes of milk chocolate, vanilla and deep caramel. If this doesn't seem to suit the palette of the person you're gifting, Trade has an extensive selection of ethically and locally sourced coffee that carries something for every preference.

name: A set of four acrylic tumblers
description: These dishwasher-safe highball glasses are made from a delightful jelly-finish acrylic and are perfect for outdoor gatherings or pool-side beverages. Snag them in five different color options.

name: A swivel cheese board
description: Made from bamboo and designed with compact storage in mind, this swivel cheese board folds open to reveal three tiers of serving space and is perfect for the charcuterie lover in your life.

name: A "salut" and "adieu" doormat
description: This clever dual-ended doormat gives an appropriate salutation to anyone coming or going. It's made from natural coconut fibers and measures 18 by 30 inches.

name: A monogrammed leather tassel keychain
description: The perfect addition to a new set of house or apartment keys, this tassel keychain from Mark & Graham is made from genuine leather and metal hardware and can be customized with your person's name or initials. There are also tons of color combinations to choose from.

name: A luxury berry-scented candle
description: Fans of "Sex And The City" may already be familiar with the true symbol of luxury that is the Baies candle from Diptyque. If you're not, rest assured the fragrance of freshly picked blackcurrant berries and flowery rose accents emitted by this candle will be sure to knock the socks off of anyone receiving it.

name: A 4-pack of Apple Airtags
description: The Apple Airtag is arguably one of the easiest ways to track down lost valuables like a purse or luggage during travel. It uses precision finding with ultra wideband technology utilizes Apple's Find My network, a crowdsourced platform that can track missing items once an Airtag is placed in lost mode.

name: A pair of Turkish cotton bath towels
description: These good-looking bath towels from Brooklinen are made from 100% Turkish cotton and are OEKO-TEX-certified for using human- and eco-safe dyes.They are available in mango, mint and pink checkerboard designs.

name: A beyond-popular carpet and upholstery cleaner
description: If the person you're gifting happens to be a pet owner and doesn’t already own a Bissell Little Green, this gift will really wow them. This portable carpet and upholstery cleaner has close to 43,000 five-star ratings on Amazon and effectively removes tough stains through a combination of suction and spraying power. Plus, they don’t have to worry about manually cleaning the scrubbing stain tool as it has a self-cleaning function to save them time and effort.

name: A versatile workplace monitor stand
description: Both functional and nice to look at, this workplace monitor stand can be used in multiple ways to satisfy anyone's home office needs. It's made from sleek ash wood and comes with several compartments ideal for storing and organizing documents, notebooks and other desk accessories.

name: A luxe faux fur throw
description: Luxurious and plush, this Anthropologie-exclusive throw comes in five colorways, each one featuring a white frosted tip effect. The blankets are made from OEKO-TEX-certified materials that are eco-friendly and free from chemicals.

name: A Le Creuset stoneware casserole dish
description: You can never go wrong gifting a piece from Le Creuset, an iconic brand known for crafting quality enameled cookware that's coveted by home cooks and professionals alike. This particular casserole dish is made from a highly thermal-resistant stoneware and has been enameled to ensure a non-porous, non-reactive, and scratch-resistant performance. It's available in a number of colors and is safe for use in the microwave, oven, freezer and can even be popped in the dishwasher.

name: Yeti Rambler travel mug
description: Everyone loves having water close at hand, and there's a good chance your mom’s drinking vessel could use a bit of an update. This 30-ounce mug from Yeti is as good as it gets. It's leak-resistant, cup holder-friendly, dishwasher-safe and and vacuum insulated to keep warm drinks hot and cold drinks nice and chilly. It's available in nine different colors.

name: A teak bowl
description: Merging clean, modern design with earthy, rustic material, this decorative bowl will fit in effortlessly with any decor. It’s “very pleasing to [the] eye and looks great on a coffee table” says

name: A Barefoot Dreams plush hooded robe
description: There's an internet fervor surrounding Barefoot Dreams, maker of the celebrity-loved blankets, bathrobes and socks. This plush unisex bathrobe is made from the brand's signature ultra-soft and slightly stretchy ribbed fabric and comes in three colors and three general sizes.

name: A fully washable rug
description: changed the game when it comes to large-scale rugs that previously would only be spot-cleaned. On its website, you can choose from a variety of sizes, styles and pile options, but each rug is

name: A classic pair of Adidas Gazelles
description: The iconic Adidas Gazelle hails from the late '60s, but it's a style that remains ever on trend. This pair is a reissue of the 1991 Gazelle, with the same suede materials, proportions and textures as the original. They are available in 11 colors in men's sizes 4-14.

name: The iconic 10-in-1 Always Pan
description: Meant to do the job of 10 pieces of traditional cookware, the Always Pan is made from an exclusive non-stick ceramic coating and is capable of braising, searing, steaming, straining, sautéing, frying, storing and more. The fact that it comes in a selection of ultra-displayable colors doesn't hurt, either.

name: A flight of artisan infused olive oils
description: Brightland's 4-piece capsule of infused cold-pressed olive oils is the ultimate present for any indulgent home cook. The set comes with garlic, basil, chili and lemon oils housed inside UV-coated glass bottles that are just begging to be displayed.

name: A dual 5-port and USB power brick
description: Fashioned from a heavy-die cast metal enclosure with a substantial rubber base, this power brick from Shinola is one functional item that they won't mind having out in the open. The charging face features five traditional ports as well as two USB ports to easily juice up all their devices at once and the durable eight-foot custom-braided cord is designed to prevent kinks. This is available in six color combinations and was made in partnership with General Electric.

name: The Incense Match original scented incense stick matches
description: This set of 16 incense matches is perfect for anyone who loves scents — especially your mom. Each of these booklets has a uniquely rich fragrance that doesn't overpower the room, with 30 matches wrapped in foil per pack. They are ideal for the bathroom, kitchen and beyond, where they’ll add a hint of a hippie vibe without feeling like you've time-traveled back to 1969.

name: Revlon One-Step Volumizer hot brush
description: Whether your mom is a total glamazon who loves getting dolled up or if she spends as little time as possible on her beauty routine, she'll love this multi-use tool. Featuring a mix of pinned and tufted bristles, it detangles and smooths even super-thick hair, providing a streamlined drying and styling process and a picture-ready hairdo every time. The larger surface area of the brush helps disperse heat quicker, so even long hair dries fast. And the ergonomic design makes it feel nice in your hand, so you don't get sore as you style away.

name: Francesca Kaye dessert plate
description: If your mom is a decorative plate collector, you have to add these beauties by Francesca Kaye to her haul. They're absolutely gorgeous, with wax seal-inspired details and beautiful hand-painted floral designs.

name: Adidas ultraboost light running shoes
description: Even if your mom isn't a runner, she'll get a ton of use out of these sporty sneakers. My siblings and I gifted a pair to my mother a few years back and she lives in them. They're cushioned and ultra-supportive in a way that feels like you are walking on clouds. They also have a cool, stylish silhouette and are available in 15 colors in sizes 5 to 12. They're absolutely worth the investment.

name: An oversized straw tote
description: One of the greatest tools in a mom’s arsenal is a big bag. Load it up with snacks, extra hand sanitizer, a phone charger, diapers, emergency sewing kit — a mom’s bag always seems to have just what you need inside. This oversized straw tote is a great, light option for warmer days. Sure, she can pack it up with her daily essentials, but she can also roll up a blanket and head to the beach with it. Customer

name: A hug in a mug
description: Thanks to an artisan look, this mug sidesteps the kitsch factor and ups the sweetness. A cheerful floral motif encircling a caption reading “hug in a mug” makes for a heartfelt treat. Add her favorite coffee blend or tea for an extra thoughtful gift. She’ll think of you every time she pours herself a hot beverage.

name: Apple’s AirTag
description: Do your mama proud with a truly practical gift. Whether you’re popping it in your purse, stashing it in the car, looping it to Fido’s collar or tucking it into your kiddo’s backpack, Apple’s AirTag has infinite uses. Whatever you want to keep track of — or are prone to losing — AirTag can help you track it on your iPhone or iPad. All you have to do is ask Siri to play a tone on the built-in speaker and — ping! — lost item found. With too-many-to-count five-star reviews, you know this gadget is, in the words of reviewer

name: A faux shagreen box with removable lid
description: In a soft jade green, this faux take on shagreen is a dead ringer for the real thing. This lidded box would be the perfect gift for a vintage fan or someone who embraces nostalgia and romance.

name: An cheery velvet floor cushion
description: It’s surprising how many different ways an oversized throw pillow comes in handy. Upgrade your meditation practice and use it as a sitting cushion, add a statement to your sofa, toss it in for extra seating at movie night, it even works as a (small) pet bed in a pinch. This luxe round cushion in sunny marigold yellow or

name: A swirled marble clay bowl
description: This swirled marble clay bowl has an elevated handmade look that will be right up your creative mom’s alley. “It looks handmade and has such character,” wrote

name: A set of Mexican train dominoes
description: My family can't get enough of this classic old-school game. iI's a fun, low-stakes way to hang out together around a table and enjoy each other's company. This set comes in a sleek and portable aluminum case and includes a starter hub, 91 dominoes, nine train markers and a score pad.

name: CB2 pinch marble salt cellar
description: Elevate your mother's everyday salt pinch pot with this marble cellar from CB2. It's carved, ground and polished by hand, which gives it a very expensive look and feel. It will make a delightfully fancy home for some flaky sea salt.

name: Laneige lip sleeping mask
description: Laneige lip sleeping mask is a wildly popular Iip mask, and for good reason. It creates a seal on the lips and lets the product’s hydrating ingredients soak in while your mother is off in dreamland.

name: Brightland The Duo olive oil set
description: If your mom loves to cook, she's going to love Brightland's set of luxuriously infused cold-pressed olive oils. The set includes two olive oil flavors: Awake, which is a bold and robust cold-pressed extra virgin olive oil that is ideal for roasting, sauteing, soups and bread, and Alive, which is a smooth and grassy EVOO that pairs perfectly with salads, hummus, greens and baked goods. Who doesn't love a fancy olive oil?

name: Short sleeved button front boilersuit
description: Sure, a jumpsuit might be an unexpected pick, but it’s the perfect one-and-done outfit. Whether she’s joining a last-minute lunch date or trying to squeeze in some studio time, an effortless denim boilersuit serves up look in a snap. Inspired by classic workwear, this jumpsuit is equipped with multiple pockets, a cinched, drawstring waist and an ever so slightly cropped fit.

name: An expert-recommended stand mixer
description: : 4.7 out of 5 stars

name: Caminito mercado canasta backpack
description: How chic is this market bag? Caminito is a Latine mother-and-daughter-owned brand that specializes in beautiful heirloom-quality items that look as good as they are functional. This woven bag puts a spin on the everyday market bag by adding backpack straps for easy hauling. It has adjustable leather shoulder straps and a woven carrying handle and zipper closure. This is exactly the kind of thing she'd probably never buy for herself, but will be so happy to have.

name: West Elm Convivial butter keeper
description: There's something timeless and elegant about a traditional French butter keeper. Not only do they look great, but they keep your butter soft and tasty. This lovely ceramic option has a simple, unique hand-formed shape that will work with any kitchen aesthetic.

name: Vuori Elijo rain jacket
description: Available in two colors, this chic rain jacket is perfect for misty morning walks. It has a drawstring hood, storm flap and bungee hem and is fully lined for warmth while also remaining breathable and water-resistant. It's as elegant as it is practical and comes in sizes XS to XL.

name: The Kombucha Shop's organic kombucha starter kit
description: If your mom is into fermentation, whether it be a beverage or even kimchi, then she just might like making her own kombucha at home. This kit makes it easy to dabble in a new, tasty hobby. It includes everything she needs to get started and is guaranteed to be a hit.

name: Ilia super serum skin tint SPF 40
description: If your mom loves a multitasking beauty product, then this skin tint is about to become a staple in her repertoire. It is a tinted serum that also functions as sun protection, making it a triple threat. It's skin care, makeup and sunscreen in one! It's available in 30 different shades.

name: A new oven-safe (!) version of the Always Pan
description: : 4.6 out of 5 stars

name: A plush Brooklinen robe
description: 4.4 out of 5 stars

name: A set of ultra-soft bamboo sheets
description: 4.5 out of 5 stars

name: An indoor smart garden
description: 4.6 out of 5 stars

name: An ultra-popular lip sleeping mask
description: 4.6 out of 5 stars

name: A remote selfie clicker for family pictures
description: Give yourself the gift of never crouching around her phone for a group selfie with this remote shutter. It works with most smartphone cameras to take photos hands-free.

name: A nephrite jade satin-finish bangle
description: ancient Chinese beliefs, jade represents purity, beauty, longevity and even immortality. Cut using traditional methods, this bangle is made from genuine Canadian nephrite jade and features a satin finish, a unique delineation from the customary glossy finish of jade jewelry. The bangle is approximately 10 millimeters thick and is available in seven different sizes.

name: W&S chubby vase
description: It doesn't get much cooler than this chubby, sculptural vase at Design Within Reach. Available in two colors, this stoneware vessel has two openings and is stylish enough to be used as a decorative element on it's own or with the addition of a beautiful bouquet of flowers. And at under $100, it's relatively reasonably priced for such a high-end-looking object.

name: Vionic Marrin heeled sandal
description: Wedding season is upon us, and there's a good chance Mama could use some new dancing shoes. These comfy, stylish and cute heels are the perfect companion to a party dress. They have a rounded stack heel that won't hurt her feet and an adjustable ankle closure to keep her stable and safe. They're available in two colors in sizes 5 to 11.

name: TheraGun Elite massage gun
description: This wildly popular massage gun is Bluetooth-connective and offers percussive therapy that reaches 16 mm into the muscle and features advanced sound insulation for super-quiet performance. Users can choose from five attachments and five speeds. It's perfect for everyday aches and pains along with the wear and tear that accompanies fitness injuries, making it an ideal gift for a sporty mum.

name: Tatcha’s The Dewy Skin Cream
description: Give your mother the gift of a delectable, rich and nourishing luxury cream like this one from Tatcha. It's the dream gift for a skin care lover. This hydrating cream replenishes ceramides, leaving skin more bright, bouncy and silky soft. Just be forewarned that you'll probably get her hooked!

name: NuFace Trinity starter kit
description: If your mom loves gizmos and gadgets, then she needs the NuFace Trinity device. It has gained near-cult status in recent years, with devotees swearing by its facial toning prowess. It’s an FDA-cleared microcurrent device that claims to gently stimulate the face and neck in an effort to tone, lift and contour facial muscles and reduce the look of fine lines and wrinkles. You can purchase various additional attachments, like a red light wrinkle reducer and lip and eye wand, but

name: Lack of Color Utopia Inca raffia bucket hat
description: Mark my words, the straw bucket hat is about to be

name: Our Place container collection
description: Give your mom's Tupperware collection a much-needed facelift and replace it with these gorgeous storage containers from Our Place. Available in two colors in sets of three or six, this high-quality set is lightweight, stackable, space-saving and versatile, made with durable glass that can do everything from store dry goods, to freeze sauces and soups and beyond.

name: Thousand Fell women's court sneakers
description: These sneakers are as timeless and elegant as it gets, and they have the same vibe as

name: A three-piece hard-shell luggage set
description: 4.6 out of 5 stars

name: An all-in-one hair dryer and hot air brush
description: 4.6 out of 5 stars

name: A pair of comfy cloud slides
description: 4.4 out of 5 stars

name: An espresso machine with over 21,000 reviews
description: : 4.6 out of 5 stars

name: A skincare set for glowy skin
description: more than 2,252 five-star reviews

name: An affordable mascara that provides amazing results
description: 4.4 out of 5 stars

name: A colorful notebook so she can journal or brain dump
description: Perfect for journaling, writing songs or poems or just jotting a quick note on the go, these Paperage notebooks look way more expensive than they are. They're sleek and easy to carry along and also look cute on a desk.

name: A budget-friendly massage gun to get those knots
description: Sure, you could splurge and get your mom one great massage, or you could save money and give her the ability to sooth and relieve muscles whenever she wants. This budget-friendly gun has six attachable heads and is easily rechargeable.

name: A set of yoga blocks and a strap for a moment of zen
description: Perhaps your mom is getting into yoga or pilates. If she's stocking up her home workout space or just loves to downward dog, she'll love having her own set of yoga blocks and a stretching strap to use at home.

name: A colorful ergonomic chair to brighten up the home office
description: Relieve some pressure in your mom's lower back with this colorful ergonomic desk chair. It comes in blue, pink, orange, green and other fun colors to give her home office a little flair.

name: A heated foot massager so she can take a load off
description: After a long day, there's nothing better than a foot rub. With this heated remote-controlled foot massager, your mom can sit back and relax and feel pampered at home.

name: An indoor garden for veggies and herbs
description: If your mom has a green thumb, she'll love growing herbs and plants in this indoor mini garden. It has a hydroponic growing system, which runs on water, meaning there's less dirt and grime in getting your greens.

name: A pair of gold vermeil twisted hoops
description: Featuring a popular twist design, these minimal everyday hoops are made using gold vermeil, a process that's different from regular gold plating in that there's a thick layer of 18-karat solid gold on top of sterling silver, making it more durable and tarnish-resistant.

name: A pair of baroque pearl drop earrings
description: These drop earrings feature large baroque pearls and are made by a small women-owned business based in California. They are available in either sterling silver or 18-karat gold-filled finishes.

name: A sweet pendant necklace just for first-time moms
description: Intended to honor first-time moms, this nickel-free 14-karat gold-filled necklace comes with an adjustable high-shine chain and features a high quality 9mm Swarovski birthstone in the center.

name: A sterling silver signet ring
description: True to traditional signet designs, this ring can be customized with your personal monogram, up to three letters and in a variety of fonts. And if sterling silver isn't your mom's metal of choice, this is also available gold- and rose gold-plated along with 14-karat solid gold or white gold.

name: iS Clinical Super Serum Advance
description: I can't get enough of this

name: Williams Sonoma leather gardening gloves
description: If your mom likes to tinker in her garden, then a fresh pair of gardening gloves will serve as ample inspiration to get outside and enjoy the experience even more. They're made with top-grain leather that has been brushed to a soft suede finish and are perfect for protecting her hands from scratches and blisters. The soft yellow hue has an almost vintage, cottage-core aesthetic that couldn't be sweeter for spring.

name: Dansk Købenstyle wrapped handle water pitcher
description: Available in four colors, this cheerful water pitcher would be a happy addition to any kitchen. It has a cool silhouette with a glossy exterior made with enameled carbon steal with a black rim. It has a handwoven, rattan-inspired wrapped handle that just oozes retro charm and will make a lovely Mother's Day gift.

name: Everlane The Italian leather day ballet flat
description: Help your mom join one of the season's latest trends with a sweet pair of ballet flats like these from Everlane. Available in six different colors in sizes 5 to 11, they're made with recycled thin Napa leather that molds to feet, with a sculptural square toe and a high throat. They're buttery soft with a cushioned insole that makes them comfy and walkable — and how sweet is that bow detail?

name: Seedlip Garden 108 non-alcoholic spirit
description: If your mom prefers a soft beverage, she might want to dabble in making her own mocktails with the help of Seedlip's delicious non-alcoholic spirits. It's a thoughtfully made mixer with notes of peas, rosemary and thyme that will elevate everyday soda water and help any occasion feel festive.

name: The Citizenry’s premium linen bedding bundle
description: It doesn't get more luxurious than

name: An actually powerful smoothie maker
description: 4.7 out of 5 stars

name: A pair of chic hoop earrings
description: 4.5 out of 5 stars

name: A pair of second-generation Apple AirPods
description: 4.8 out of 5 stars

name: A reclining chair for some rest and relaxation
description: Give your mom the gift of sitting and taking in the sunset with this reclining outdoor chair. It moves with the body for maximum comfort and is perfect for sitting up or laying back and taking in the sun.

name: A heated eye massager for maximum chill vibes
description: It's an eye mask, it's a heated eye massager and it connects to Bluetooth to play podcasts or videos. This is basically a versatile item from the future that your mom will use every night.

name: A fancy coffee grinder for the perfect cup
description: Upgrade her everyday morning essentials with this OXO coffee grinder. It has the ability to grind beans to 15 different sizes, ensuring the perfect cup, and a handy “trap door” to minimize bean spill.

name: A family tree bracelet featuring personalized charms
description: Made with hypoallergenic and tarnish-resistant materials, this handmade charm bangle holds stamped initial charms with corresponding birthstones to represent everyone in the family. The bangle opens slightly to accommodate a variety of hand and wrist sizes.

name: A delicate diamond and sapphire bracelet
description: Nestled in the center of this ultra fine solid 14-karat gold chain is a floral wreath featuring genuine sapphire and diamond stones. Each bracelet is handmade by a jewelry maker in Turkey and can be purchased in five different sizes and gold options, including rose and white.

name: An engravable message flower pendant
description: Inspired by mid-century pendant designs, this instant heirloom necklace features a personalized birthday month flower engraving and on the back can be customized to have a short special message of your choice. The cable-style chain is 20 inches in length and has a lobster claw clasp.

name: A dainty initial necklace
description: This dainty initial charm necklace comes on an adjustable 14-inch to 22-inch chain with the option for a 1-inch extender and the choice of up 10 initials per single necklace. You can grab it in three different finishes.

name: Matching mother-daughter circle necklaces
description: This pair of matching necklaces are meant to symbolize a mother-daughter bond. They come in either 14-karat gold-filled or sterling silver finishes and the chains are 18 inches in length.

name: A stackable breast milk ring kit
description: Breast milk jewelry kits are a unique way to commemorate and preserve a person's breastfeeding journey in the form of jewelry. This dainty stackable ring set with a crown top design

name: Baggu Cloud carry-on bag
description: If your mom loves to travel, then this devastatingly practical and utterly adorable bag is just what she needs. It's shockingly roomy and functional, made with feather-light (yet super strong) recycled nylon fabric that won't weigh her down. It has a detachable interior pouch and top zip closure and comes in two colors at Urban Outfitters. It can even be folded up and packed away when not in use.

name: A Trade Coffee subscription
description: If your mom lives for her morning cup of joe, then a subscription to Trade Coffee will give her something to look forward to every day. They curate coffee according to her preferences from roasters across the country and ship them on whatever schedule you prefer. It's a great way for her to try new brands and flavors that she wouldn't otherwise have access to.

name: A dreamy muslin robe for lounging in style
description: There are few things more luxurious than a nice bathrobe. This 100% cotton muslin robe will make your mom feel like she's at the spa, even if she's just on the couch.

name: An Ember heated mug to keep her drinks hot
description: On busy mornings or lazy afternoons, give your mom the gift of a longlasting hot beverage. This heated mug from Ember connects with an app to let the drinker control the temperature as they sip away.

name: A DeWalt cordless drill and impact driver for home improvements and DIY projects
description: You can't spell "home improvement" without "mom." If you've got a handy mama in your life, she'll love this rechargeable cordless drill and impact driver for building, hanging, assembling and so much more.

name: A timeless pair of Ray-Bans to dress up any outfit
description: There are few things more timeless than a pair of Ray-Ban Wayfarers. They look good with jeans, fancy clothes or thrown on during a busy morning. Your mom will love this elegant icon.

name: An outdoor patio heater for family time outside
description: If your mama lives in a cooler climate or just loves entertaining outside, she'll be thrilled to get this propane outdoor heater. Turn your backyard into a fun dive bar and enjoy together time without shivering in the cold.

name: A pair of Airpod Pros that are noise-canceling and sweat-resistant
description: Perhaps the best give of all is one of silence — well, that or active noise cancellation so your mom can hear her book on tape. A thoughtful spurge she'll use every day, AirPod Pros connect effortlessly with all Apple devices and are water- and sweat-resistant.

name: A Yeti cooler for camping or cookouts
description: Say hello to your mom's new home entertaining must: this Yeti Tundra cooler. It can hold up to 21 cans and ice to keep drinks cool when hanging outside.

name: A birth month flower pendant
description: The teardrop pendant on this necklace features real dried and pressed flowers that correspond with your birthday month of choice using jewelers-grade UV resin. The 18-inch chain is available in either gold- or silver-plated finishes.

name: An 18-karat-filled link bracelet
description: Choose from six different link bracelet designs, including a classic Cuban link or vintage mesh, each one measuring six and half inches with the option to add an adjustable extender link. The bracelets are made of 18-karat gold filled over stainless steel for a tarnish-free and water-resistant wear.

name: A pair of cable link earrings
description: These bestselling minimalist cable link earrings have a latch-back closure and are available in both gold and silver finishes. For this design, be sure to select option "C" in the style dropdown menu.

name: A monogrammed link necklace
description: Along this paperclip-style link necklace are customizable bars that can feature the names of your loved ones. This 17.5-inch necklace is available in either gold, rose gold or silver finishes.

name: A classic Adidas trefoil T-shirt
description: This basic Adidas essential is made from sustainably sourced cotton and has a trendy loose fit that can be perfect for pairing with sweatpants or jeans. It's available in women's sizes 2XS-XL.

name: A sweet silver butterfly necklace
description: The platinum-colored butterfly feels like just the right piece for the light hearted person in your life — a little reminder to keep marching (or in this case, floating) to your own beat.

name: A nourishing tinted balm
description: Available in eight shades that range from peachy nude to deep berry, this nourishing balm casts the perfect buildable tint on lips and has a buttery texture that's comfortable to wear. It's formulated with ultra-hydrating ingredients like shea butter and rosehip seed oil.

name: A moisture-wicking tie scrunchy
description: This bow-style scrunchy, available in three muted colors, is ideal for throwing hair up in a chic bun or low ponytail. It's made from a quick-dry material with four-way stretch that also wicks away moisture.

name: A detailed melamine pitcher
description: Designed exclusively for Anthropologie by London-based artist Ellen Merchant, this dishwasher-safe pitcher is made from decaled bamboo fiber, cornstarch and melamine resin. It depicts a beautiful bird and floral design and holds 60 ounces.

name: A bedside water carafe and tumbler
description: This bedside water carafe and tumbler are made from borosilicate glass that withstands both hot and cold beverages and is dishwasher-safe as well. The matching tumbler sits securely over the mouth of the carafe when not in use to keep dust out, and the carafe can even double as a vase.

name: A bag of fair trade artisan coffee beans
description: Roasted by Denver, Colorado-based Huckleberry Coffee Roasters, this bag of coffee beans exclusive to Trade Coffee is sweet, smooth and boasts notes of milk chocolate, vanilla and deep caramel. If this doesn't suit the palette of the person you're gifting, Trade has an extensive selection of ethically and locally sourced coffee that carries something for every preference.

name: Or a gold-plated option
description: If your recipient prefers warmer colors, this free-spirited style is also available with 14K gold plating.

name: A gilded rainbow charm
description: This 14K gold-plated rainbow charm is an elegant reminder of the beauty after the storm. This design speaks to perseverance, inclusivity and the sunny-side-of-life outlook.

name: A gold-plated bear for any mother figure
description: The “mama bear” symbol is just the piece for the big love in your life: the bear-hug giver, the meal-maker, warm-hearted, always-room-for-more kind of mama.

name: A petite pink heart surrounded by silver
description: This pink enameled heart speaks to lasting love.

name: A similar option with gold plating
description: Tiny Tags also offers the option to gift this heartfelt symbol with 14K gold plating.

name: An indoor Mason jar garden
description: Perfect for the home cook who loves bundles of fresh fragrant herbs available right in their kitchen, this indoor garden kit comes with one tinted Mason-style jar and one organic herb of your choice with options including common mint, Genovese basil and flat leaf parsley. The jars use an internal passive hydroponic system that brings nutrients up to the plants' roots while regulating moisture, meaning they are completely self-watering and offer low maintenance tending.

name: A pair of baroque pearl drop earrings
description: These drop earrings feature large baroque pearls and are made by a small women-owned business based in California. They are available in either sterling silver or 18-karat gold-filled finishes.

name: A Nest perfume rollerball set
description: Fans of complex floral fragrances will adore this mini rollerball set containing three of Nest's most popular scents, including Wild Poppy (a bright blend of poppy and fruity notes of pear, raspberry and apricot) and Golden Nectar (a gourmand fragrance that features notes of orchid, amber and musk).

name: A stackable Rambler mug
description: has a longstanding reputation for crafting insanely durable drinkware that keeps beverages cold or hot for long periods of time. This 10-ounce Rambler mug is made with vacuum-insulated stainless steel and a brushed exterior that's resistant to condensation. It features their mag-slider lid and can be easily stacked when not in use for space-saving storage. There are nine colors and four sizes to choose from, along with an option to add a personalization or design.

name: A personal blender
description: This Hamilton Beach personal blender is the perfect kitchen gadget for whipping up delicious smoothies and protein-packed beverages in an instant. The powerful motor and stainless steel blades stand up to large ice cubes and the 14-ounce BPA-free blender jar doubles as a to-go cup with a travel lid. Plus, it's dishwasher-safe, so cleanup is a breeze.

name: A lightweight waffle-knit robe
description: Featuring a small waffle-knit texture that's soft and breathable, this lightweight cotton robe comes in standard women's sizes XS-XXL as well as plus sizes 1X-7X. There are 14 colors to choose from.

name: A pair of cushioned cloud slides
description: These lightweight cloud slides have a delightfully bouncy cushioned sole, an anti-skid outer sole and a soft, fully waterproof construction. They are available in unisex sizing and come in 19 color options.

name: A stackable Bentgo lunch box
description: Compact, clever and incredibly popular, this bento-style lunchbox features two compartments separated by a removable cutlery tray. Each piece of this box is made of food-grade BPA-free materials and, aside from the cutlery tray, is safe for the dishwasher and microwave.

name: Handmade aromatic shower steamers
description: These aromatic shower steamers are a great alternative for people who don't have bathtubs but still appreciate a spa-like experience. Made with refreshing menthol and essential oils, the steamers can be placed in the base of the shower to deliver aromatherapy benefits and a refreshing experience. They are available in four scents, including eucalyptus mint and rosemary lemon, and are handmade in Ohio.

name: The most comfortable jersey cotton pajama set
description: Some TikTokers claim that this lightweight

name: A fluffy pair of memory foam slippers
description: These adorable fluffy slippers come in 14 colors and patterns in women's sizes 4-10.5. They promise a supportive memory foam cushioned sole and a durable rubber outer sole, perfect for wearing indoors or for running outside to grab the mail.

name: A Bluetooth tracking tile
description: This small waterproof Bluetooth tag can slide into suitcases and wallets or easily attach to keys so valuables are never lost again. Through the Tile app, items can be tracked up to 250 feet away. Past locations remain visible even when the item is out of Bluetooth range. Your gift-receiver can also set up notifications to be alerted their item has been found, as well as sound alerts.

name: A set of silicone wine stoppers
description: The perfect solution for keeping unfinished bottles of wine fresh, this set of silicone stoppers by OXO create a completely leakproof seal and can also be used with other long-necked bottles like olive oil and balsamic vinegar. When not in use, they neatly snap together for compact storage.

name: A 100% mulberry silk sleeping mask
description: We know the anti-aging and skin-loving benefits of

name: An at-home foot spa
description: This at-home foot spa promises all the fixings of a professional pedicure like massaging water jets, a heated water system and raised nodes to help ease sore and tired feet. There's also a removable pumice stone to help exfoliate rough heels.

name: A natural wild rose candle
description: This La Jolíe Muse natural soy wax candle sits in an embossed glass jar and quickly diffuses notes of damask rose and bright lemon. It promises 72 hours of burn time and has a clean-burning cotton wick.

name: For the mom who always forgets their keys
description: Never let your mom misplace their keys again with the Tile Mate, a tiny Bluetooth tracking device they can use to find whatever they attach it to — luggage, a key ring, wallet or purse or a child's backpack.

name: For the mom who loves streaming and art
description: Designed to look a piece of framed artwork, Samsung's The Frame TV displays life-like paintings and photographs when it’s not playing their favorite movies or TV shows. You can order

name: For the skin care fanatic
description: For the beauty aficionado in your life, Dr. Dennis Gross's DRx SpectraLite FaceWare Pro is the perfect gift as it uses LED lights over the entire face to target the look of wrinkles and breakouts. Many brands have their own versions, but Dr. Dennis Gross’ FDA-cleared technology uses a combination of 100 red lights and 62 blue lights that work together to target common skin issues. Red light supports natural collagen production, which helps to smooth the look of fine lines and wrinkles and diminish visible discoloration, scars and damage, while blue light targets acne-causing bacteria, helping shorten the length of breakouts, calm red skin and prevent future breakouts.

name: For the makeup-lover
description: As you're reading this, your mom's makeup brushes are probably sitting on their vanity, still dirty from last use (and maybe the last

name: For moms always jotting down notes
description: The Rocketbook boasts a special technology that allows your mom to scan and send their drawings, notes or grocery lists straight to their phone using the free Rocketbook app — all they have to do is use the included pen and microfiber towel. No more losing small pieces of paper! It comes in various colors, including purple, orange, black, teal and red.

name: For the mom who lost her first pair of AirPods
description: These sweat-resistant and Siri-responsive second generation Apple AirPod Pros offer active noise cancellation to smartly detect and block outside noise during listening. The earbuds also come with tapered silicone tips that come in three different sizes for a comfortable and customizable fit.

name: For moms who need help around the house
description: Let Alexa become their personal in-house assistant by using the Echo Show 5, a smart display device that allows them to set alarms and timers, check their calendar or the news, make video calls and stream shows and movies via Netflix, Prime Video and more. Plus, they can even turn the screen into a digital frame to show off family photos.

name: For the bookworm who prefers reading the conventional way
description: If they enjoy reading physical books but want to dip their toes into e-reading, the Kindle Paperwhite is a great introduction. It is a thin, lightweight e-reader with a glare-free 6.8-inch display that looks like real paper, not a screen, so they can read and relax without straining their eyes, whether they're inside or outdoors. This latest version of the Kindle is waterproof, so they can also read by the pool or in the bath without stressing about splashes. The battery lasts for up to 10 weeks, and it has 8GB of storage for all of their books, magazines and audiobooks.

name: For moms who get their steps in
description: The slim Walking Pad folds in half and comes with wheels, making storage a breeze. It also includes a remote control and they can connect it to via app. It goes up to about 3.7 miles per hour and has two modes: automatic, which allows them to control how fast the belt goes using their feet and their own walking speed, or manual, through which they can set a speed using the remote.

name: For moms who need a break from vacuuming
description: This smart and ultra-quiet Eufy BoostIQ RoboVac 11S features a slimmer design compared to most robot vacs on the market, making storage easier and cleaning beneath tight spaces possible. Its BoostIQ technology senses when more power suction is needed to provide the most effective clean possible. Compatible with both hardwood floors and medium-pile carpets, the RoboVac runs for up to 100 minutes per charge and uses a three-point cleaning system on the underside of the vacuum to help gather debris and messes.

name: For moms who want headphones that are actually stylish
description: Whether they love working out to hype music or just enjoy listening to podcasts or their favorite tunes, the Apple AirPods Max over-ear headphones make an excellent chic gift for the audiophile in your life. They feature active noise cancellation, spatial audio and memory foam ear cushions for a comfortable fit. Get them in green, pink, silver, gray or blue.

name: For moms who can't live without their coffee
description: Give them the gift of coffee shop-quality espresso in the comfort of their home with the Breville Barista Express espresso machine. Lattes, Americanos, cappuccinos and espresso shots are precisely crafted thanks to a carefully designed conical burr grinder that grinds beans on demand and a frother for perfectly delicious steamed milk. It's the stuff coffee dreams are made of.

name: For moms who like their coffee hot
description: Speaking of coffee, your loved one won't know the meaning of a lukewarm beverage with this Ember smart mug that keeps drinks hot up to 1.5 hours on a full charge. The mug is controlled through the Ember app to set the temperature, customize preset settings and view notifications.

name: For moms always on the road
description: The Halo Bolt portable car jump-starter and charger is perfect for moms who are always on the go. It has enough power to jump start a car, truck, boat, motorcycle or lawn mower and even comes with cables. It's also great for power on road trips thanks to the two USB ports that can charge their phone, tablet and more.

name: For an at-home massage experience
description: Whether they have aches and pains or not, having a Theragun on hand is always a convenient way to soothe the body after a long day. The mini version is great because it's much more compact and easy to hold on to, but packs the same punch as a regular-sized Theragun.

name: For pet moms
description: Specifically made with pets (and pet parents) in mind, the Furbo dog camera allows your loved one to live stream video day or night thanks to night vision and a 160-degree wide-angle view. It features two-way audio and a barking sensor. It also has treat-tossing capabilities that furry friends will surely appreciate.

name: For sporty moms
description: With amazing health features like notifications about irregular heart rhythms, sleep tracking, blood oxygen monitoring and fall detection, the Apple Watch Series 7 can just about do it all. And if your mom is looking to upgrade their fitness routine, it even has special sensors that track exactly how they move. Plus, each purchase comes with three free months of Apple Fitness+.

name: For moms with a green thumb
description: Shopping for someone that wants to develop their green thumb but doesn't have space for a garden? The AeroGarden kit includes seeds to grow Genovese basil, curly parsley, dill, thyme, Thai basil and mint — all without having to place it outside. It comes with powerful and effective LED grow lights as well as a taller lamp arm; the combination is designed to maximize photosynthesis, which leads to quicker growth. It even has an automatic timer to turn lights on and off at the correct times and additional buttons that remind them when to add water and plant food.
